description.value:
You or your parents were slaves in the deep dark mines and your eyes are adjusted as a result. You have darkvision, but when relying on it, you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Dazzled]{Dazzled}.

Special: If short legs were never enslaved and you come from a fine line of liberated ponies, this should be considered uncommon, only likely to appear after a long period of time in darkness.
